column2: "Mma hom akoma nntutu: hom ngye Nyankopɔn ndzi
"M'egya fie wɔ tsenabew pii; sɛ ɔnntse dɛm a
column3: nkyɛ maka akyerɛ hom. Morokɔ ekesiesie beebi mama hom."

column2: "Na sɛ mokɔ
column3: na mikesiesie beebi ma hom a
column4: mebɛba bio mabɛfa hom akɔ mankasa me nkyɛn

column2: "Na mbrɛ morokɔ no
"Tomas see no dɛ
column5: na yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ehu kwan no?"

column2: "Jesus see no dɛ
column5: nye nkwa no; obi mmba Egya no hɔ

column2: "Sɛ hom enya ehu me a
column3: nkyɛ hom ehu m'Egya no so; na ofitsi ndɛ hom nyim no

column2: "Filip see no dɛ
column4: kyerɛ hɛn Egya no na ɔnoara dɔɔ so ma hɛn."

column2: "Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Ana menye hom wɔ hɔ dadaada yi
column6: oehu Egya no; na ɔyɛ dɛn na ese dɛ

column2: "Ana enngye nndzi dɛ mowɔ Egya no mu
column3: na Egya no so wɔ mo mu? Nsɛm a meka kyerɛ hom yi
column5: na Egya no a ɔtse mo mu no

column2: "Hom ngye me ndzi dɛ mowɔ Egya no mu
column3: na Egya no so wɔ mo mu; na annyɛ dɛm a
column4: ndwuma noara ntsi hom ngye me ndzi."

column2: "Mese hom nokwar mu dɛ
column6: na dza ɔkyɛn yinom mpo na ɔbɛyɛ

column2: "Na biribiara a hom bɛserɛ wɔ me dzin mu no
column4: ama Egya no eenya enyimnyam wɔ Ba no mu."

column2: "Sɛ hom serɛ biribi wɔ me dzin mu a
"Sɛ hom dɔ me a
"Na mibebisa Egya no
"nokwar Sunsum no a: ɔno na wiadze nntum nngye no; osiandɛ onnhu no
column3: na eso onnyim no: na hom dze
column4: hom nyim no; osiandɛ ɔtse hom nkyɛn

column2: "Mirinngya hom ngyanka
"Aka kakrabaabi na wiadze nnhu me bio
column4: hom hu me; osiandɛ metse ase yi

column2: "Da no hom bohu dɛ mowɔ m'Egya no mu na hom wɔ no mu
column3: na mo so mowɔ hom mu."

column2: "Nyia ɔwɔ me mbransɛm na odzi do no
"Judas (nnyɛ Iskariot bi a) see no dɛ
column5: na iribeyi woho akyerɛ hɛn na nnyɛ wiadze yi?"

column2: "Jesus buae see no dɛ
column4: obesie m'asɛm: na m'Egya bɔdɔ no
column6: na yɛbɛyɛ hɛn tsenabew wɔ ne nkyɛn."

column2: "Nyia ɔnndɔ me no
column3: onnsie me nsɛm: na asɛm a hom tse yi
column5: na ɔyɛ Egya no a ɔsomaa me no dze."

column2: "Dɛm nsɛm yi na maka akyerɛ hom
column3: ber a metse hom nkyɛn yi."

column2: "Na Okyigyinafo no a ɔyɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a Egya no bɔsoma no wɔ me dzin mu no
column3: ɔno na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ hom ndzɛmba nyina: ɔbɛkaa hom dza maka akyerɛ hom nyina."

column2: "Asomdwee na medze gya hom; mara m'asomdwee na medze mema hom: nnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ wiadze ma
column3: na mema hom. Mma hom akoma nntutu

column2: "Hom tsee mbrɛ mekaa kyerɛɛ hom dɛ morokɔ na maba hom nkyɛn no. Sɛ hom dɔ me a
column3: nkyɛ hom bedzi dɛw dɛ morokɔ Egya no hɔ
column4: osiandɛ Egya no so sen me."

column2: "Na afei maka akyerɛ hom ansaana aba mu
"Menye hom nnkɛkasa pii bio
column4: na onnyi mo do tum biara."

column2: "Na mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma wiadze eehu dɛ modɔ Egya no
column3: na dɛ mbrɛ Egya no hyɛɛ me no
column4: dɛmara na meyɛ. Hom nsoɛr ma yemfi ha nkɔ."
